ovdesc.p: BL.MATURITY file gets created with the id as Maturity date of the BL and BL.BILL id separated by ".".
This file used for BL contract batch processing during End of day.

desc.p: This field shows the BL.BILL id for which the BR is attached.
This file id is the maturity date of the Bill and BL.BILL id separated by ".".
This field shows the BL.REGISTER id corresponding to the BL.MATURITY ID.
